{"step_by_step_thinking": "The most common bone cancer is determined by the frequency of occurrence. Osteosarcoma is a primary bone cancer that arises from the cells that form bones. Metastatic bone cancer refers to cancer that has spread to the bones from another part of the body. Multiple myeloma is a cancer of plasma cells in the bone marrow. Squamous cell carcinoma is a type of skin cancer. Considering the options, the most common bone cancer is A. Osteosarcoma.", "answer_choice": "A"}
